item.title: The end of October often rewards stock investors with this profitable trade
item.description: Many institutional investors close their fiscal year on Oct. 31 and buy stocks at that time with excess cash.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
